    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • do_part1

      public static void do_part1()
      do_part1() that will read book records from a number of CSV-formatted text files, checking only for syntax errors and classifying into their respected genres.

    • verification1

      public static void verification1(String record) throws TooManyFieldsException, TooFewFieldsException, MissingFieldException, UnknownGenreException
      This function takes a line of the file and filter them if it has any syntax errors
      Parameters:
      record - is a specific line of the book
      Throws:
      TooManyFieldsException - for a line with too many attributes
      TooFewFieldsException - for a line with too few attributes
      MissingFieldException - for a missing field
      UnknownGenreException - for a unknown genre

    • writeTextFile

      public static void writeTextFile(String record, String file)
      This method allows us to write into a text file
      Parameters:
      record - is a string that takes from the file
      file - is a string that refers to the file name where its going to be written

    • writeTextFileError

      public static boolean writeTextFileError(String record, String error, String book, boolean bookPart, String errorFile, String type)
      This method allows us to write into a text file all the errors
      Parameters:
      record - is the line of the file
      error - is the type of exception/ the reason of the error
      book - is the origin of the record
      bookPart - is a condition to not write more than once
      errorFile - is the place where the errors are written
      type - the type of error
      Returns:
      the condition if is written once

    • verification2

      public static Book verification2(String record) throws BadIsbn10Exception, BadIsbn13Exception, BadPriceException, BadYearException
      This method filters out all the error lines in the file
      Parameters:
      record - is the line of the file
      Returns:
      a book
      Throws:
      BadIsbn10Exception - for wrong 10 isbn
      BadIsbn13Exception - for wrong 13 isbn
      BadPriceException - for invalid price
      BadYearException - for invalid year
